priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire DRRI-2 Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C141672

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire DRRI-2 Test Name Terminology

definition: Deployment Risk and Resilience Inventory-2 test name.
name: Deployment Risk and Resilience Inventory-2 Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire DRRI-2 Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Deployment Risk and Resilience Inventory-2 Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I participated in dangerous military duties.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Dangerous Military Duties

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I was emotionally mistreated (for example, ignored or repeatedly told I was no good).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Emotionally Mistreated

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I experienced a natural disaster (for example, a hurricane), a fire, or an accident in which I or someone close to me was hurt or had serious property damage.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Experienced Natural Disaster

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I was seriously physically injured by another person (for example, hit or beaten up) during adulthood (age 18 or later).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Injured by Person - Adulthood

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I was seriously physically injured by another person (for example, hit or beaten up) during childhood (before age 18).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Injured by Person - Childhood

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I lost my job or had serious trouble finding a job.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Lost My Job/Trouble Finding Job
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-A: Lost My Job/Trouble Finding Job
synonyms: DRRI1-A: Lost My Job/Trouble Finding Job

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I was physically punished by a parent or primary caregiver.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Physically Punished by Parent

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I was robbed or had my home broken into.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Robbed/Had My Home Broken Into
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-A: Robbed/Had My Home Broken Into
synonyms: DRRI1-A: Robbed/Had My Home Broken Into

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I saw or heard physical fighting between my parents or caregivers.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Saw/Heard Physical Fight Parent

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I experienced serious financial problems.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Serious Financial Problems

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I experienced serious physical or mental health problems.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Serious Physical Health Problem

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: someone close to me experienced a serious illness, injury, or mental health problem (for example, cancer, alcohol/drug problem).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Someone Close Serious Illness

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: someone close to me died.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Someone Close to Me Died
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-A: Someone Close to Me Died
synonyms: DRRI1-A: Someone Close to Me Died

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I experienced stressful legal problems (for example, being sued, suing someone else, or being in a custody battle).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Stressful Legal Problems

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I experienced unwanted sexual activity as a result of force, threat of harm, or manipulation during adulthood (age 18 or later).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Unwanted Sex Activity Adulthood

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I experienced unwanted sexual activity as a result of force, threat of harm, or manipulation during childhood (before age 18).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Unwanted Sex Activity Childhood

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I went through a divorce or was left by a significant other.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Went Through Divorce/Was Left

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Before deployment: I witnessed someone being seriously assaulted or killed.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - A: Witnessed Someone Assaulted

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: I felt like my contributions to my family were appreciated.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: Contribution Family Appreciated

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: family members knew what I thought and how I felt about things.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: Family Knew What I Thought/Felt
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-B: Family Knew What I Thought/Felt
synonyms: DRRI1-B: Family Knew What I Thought/Felt

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: family members told me when they were having a problem.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: Family Told Me When Problem
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-B: Family Told Me When Problem
synonyms: DRRI1-B: Family Told Me When Problem

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: I felt like I fit in with my family.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: Felt Like I Fit in With Family
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-B: Felt Like I Fit in With Family
synonyms: DRRI1-B: Felt Like I Fit in With Family

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: I got along well with my family members.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: Got Along Well With My Family
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-B: Got Along Well With My Family
synonyms: DRRI1-B: Got Along Well With My Family

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: I could be myself around family members.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: I Could Be Myself Around Family
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-B: I Could Be Myself Around Family
synonyms: DRRI1-B: I Could Be Myself Around Family

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: I was affectionate with family members.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: I Was Affectionate With Family
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-B: I Was Affectionate With Family
synonyms: DRRI1-B: I Was Affectionate With Family

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: my input was sought on important family decisions.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: Input Sought Family Decisions

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: my opinions were valued by other family members.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: Opinions Were Valued by Family
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-B: Opinions Were Valued by Family
synonyms: DRRI1-B: Opinions Were Valued by Family

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: I played an important role in my family.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: Played Important Role in Family
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-B: Played Important Role in Family
synonyms: DRRI1-B: Played Important Role in Family

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: I shared many common interests and activities with family members.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: Shared Interests With Family

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During childhood: I spent as much of my free time with family members as possible.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - B: Spent My Free Time With Family
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-B: Spent My Free Time With Family
synonyms: DRRI1-B: Spent My Free Time With Family

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: the climate was uncomfortable.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Climate Was Uncomfortable

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: the conditions I lived in were extremely unsanitary.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Conditions Extremely Unsanitary

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I had to deal with annoying animals, insects, or plants.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Deal With Annoying Animals

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I didn't have access to bathrooms or showers when I needed them.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Didn't Have Bathrooms

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: the food I had to eat was of very poor quality (for example, bad or old MREs).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Food Was of Very Poor Quality
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-C: Food Was of Very Poor Quality
synonyms: DRRI1-C: Food Was of Very Poor Quality

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I had to hassle with putting on and taking off heavy or annoying gear.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Hassle With Heavy/Annoying Gear

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was exposed to awful smells.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: I Was Exposed to Awful Smells
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-C: I Was Exposed to Awful Smells
synonyms: DRRI1-C: I Was Exposed to Awful Smells

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was subjected to loud noises.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: I Was Subjected to Loud Noises
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-C: I Was Subjected to Loud Noises
synonyms: DRRI1-C: I Was Subjected to Loud Noises

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was not allowed to do the things I needed to do to get my job done.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Not Allowed to Get Job Done
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-C: Not Allowed to Get Job Done
synonyms: DRRI1-C: Not Allowed to Get Job Done

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I did not have adequate shelter from uncomfortable living conditions (for example, heat, cold, wet, etc.).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Not Have Adequate Shelter

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: my daily activities were restricted because of local religious or ethnic customs.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Restricted Because Local Custom

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I wasn't able to contact home when I needed to.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Wasn't Able to Contact Home
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-C: Wasn't Able to Contact Home
synonyms: DRRI1-C: Wasn't Able to Contact Home

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I wasn't able to get as much privacy as I needed.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Wasn't Able to Get Privacy
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-C: Wasn't Able to Get Privacy
synonyms: DRRI1-C: Wasn't Able to Get Privacy

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I wasn't able to get rest when I needed it.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - C: Wasn't Able to Rest

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I took part in an assault on entrenched or fortified positions that involved naval and/or land forces.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Assault on Entrenched Positions

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I encountered land or water mines, booby traps, or roadside bombs (for example, IEDs).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Encountered Land Mines

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was exposed to hostile incoming fire.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Exposed Hostile Incoming Fire

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was exposed to "friendly" fire.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Exposed to Friendly Fire

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I fired my weapon at enemy combatants.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Fired My Weapon Enemy Combatant
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-D: Fired My Weapon Enemy Combatant
synonyms: DRRI1-D: Fired My Weapon Enemy Combatant

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was injured in a combat-related incident.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Injured Combat-Related Incident

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was involved in locating or disarming explosive devices.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Locating Explosive Devices

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was part of a land or naval artillery unit that fired on enemy combatants.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Part of Unit Fired on Enemy
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-D: Part of Unit Fired on Enemy
synonyms: DRRI1-D: Part of Unit Fired on Enemy

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I participated in hand-to-hand combat.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Participate Hand-to-hand Combat

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was involved in searching and/or disarming potential enemy combatants.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Search/Disarm Potential Enemy

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was involved in searching or clearing homes, buildings, or other locations.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Searching Homes/Buildings

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I think I wounded or killed someone during combat operations.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Think I Wounded/Killed Someone

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was in a vehicle (for example, a "humvee", helicopter, or boat) or part of a convoy that was attacked.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Vehicle/Part of Convoy Attacked

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I went on combat patrols or missions.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Went on Combat Patrols/Missions

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I personally witnessed civilians (for example, women and children) being seriously wounded or killed.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Witnessed Civilians Wounded

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I personally witnessed enemy combatants being seriously wounded or killed.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Witnessed Enemy Wounded/Killed

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I personally witnessed someone from my unit or an ally unit being seriously wounded or killed.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - D: Witnessed Someone Unit Wounded

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I interacted with detainees or prisoners of war.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Interacted With Detainees

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was involved in handling human remains.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Involved Handling Human Remains

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I observed homes or communities that had been destroyed.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Observed Homes Been Destroyed

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I saw Americans or allies after they had been severely wounded or disfigured.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Saw Americans Had Been Wounded
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-E: Saw Americans Had Been Wounded
synonyms: DRRI1-E: Saw Americans Had Been Wounded

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I saw the bodies of dead Americans or allies.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Saw Bodies of Dead Americans
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-E: Saw Bodies of Dead Americans
synonyms: DRRI1-E: Saw Bodies of Dead Americans

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I saw the bodies of dead civilians.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Saw Bodies of Dead Civilians
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-E: Saw Bodies of Dead Civilians
synonyms: DRRI1-E: Saw Bodies of Dead Civilians

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I saw the bodies of dead enemy combatants.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Saw Bodies of Dead Enemy
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-E: Saw Bodies of Dead Enemy
synonyms: DRRI1-E: Saw Bodies of Dead Enemy

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I saw civilians after they had been severely wounded or disfigured.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Saw Civilians After Wounded

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I saw enemy combatants after they had been severely wounded or disfigured.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Saw Combatants Had Been Wounded
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-E: Saw Combatants Had Been Wounded
synonyms: DRRI1-E: Saw Combatants Had Been Wounded

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I saw people begging for food.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Saw People Begging for Food
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-E: Saw People Begging for Food
synonyms: DRRI1-E: Saw People Begging for Food

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I saw refugees who had lost their homes or belongings.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Saw Refugees Who Had Lost Homes
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-E: Saw Refugees Who Had Lost Homes
synonyms: DRRI1-E: Saw Refugees Who Had Lost Homes

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was exposed to the sight, sound, or smell of dead or dying animals.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Sight/Sound/Smell Dead Animals

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I took care of injured or dying people.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - E: Took Care Injured/Dying People

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I was exposed to government-issued DEET-containing insect repellents.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Exposed Government-issued DEET

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I was exposed to burning trash or burning feces.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Exposed to Burning Trash/Feces

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I was exposed to chlorine gas.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Exposed to Chlorine Gas

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I was exposed to depleted uranium in munitions.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Exposed to Depleted Uranium

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I was exposed to diesel or other petrochemical fuel on my skin.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Exposed to Diesel/Fuel on Skin
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-F: Exposed to Diesel/Fuel on Skin
synonyms: DRRI1-F: Exposed to Diesel/Fuel on Skin

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I was exposed to fumes or exhaust from heaters or generators, including heaters in tents.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Exposed to Fumes From Heaters
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-F: Exposed to Fumes From Heaters
synonyms: DRRI1-F: Exposed to Fumes From Heaters

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I was exposed to mustard gas or other blistering agents.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Exposed to Mustard Gas

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I was exposed to nerve gas agents (for example, sarin).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Exposed to Nerve Gas Agents
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-F: Exposed to Nerve Gas Agents
synonyms: DRRI1-F: Exposed to Nerve Gas Agents

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I was exposed to nuclear, biological, or chemical weapons.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Exposed to Nuclear Weapons

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I was exposed to other pesticides (for example, in flea collars, uniforms, or the environment).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Exposed to Other Pesticides

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I was exposed to smoke or other air pollution.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Exposed to Smoke/Air Pollution

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I received preventative vaccinations by injection (for example, to prevent anthrax or botulism).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Received Vaccinations

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - Either in preparation for or during my deployment: I took preventative pills (for example, to protect against nerve gas).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - F: Took Preventative Pills

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was concerned that a rocket or mortar would hit our living quarters.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Concern Rocket/Mortar Would Hit

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was concerned that I might be exposed to depleted uranium in munitions.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Concerned Depleted Uranium

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was concerned that I would encounter an explosive device (for example, a roadside bomb, mine, or booby trap).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Concerned Encounter Explosive

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was concerned about getting an infectious disease.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Concerned Infectious Disease

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was concerned that the locals who were supposed to be helping us were actually working against us.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Concerned Locals Against Us

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was concerned that the medicine I was given to protect me from illness would make me sick.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Concerned Medicine Make Me Sick
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-G: Concerned Medicine Make Me Sick
synonyms: DRRI1-G: Concerned Medicine Make Me Sick

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was concerned that I might be taken hostage.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Concerned Taken Hostage

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was concerned about being trapped in the crossfire of rival factions.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Concerned Trapped in Crossfire

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I feared that I would become sick from pesticides (for example, bug spray) or other routinely used chemicals.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Feared Sick From Pesticides

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I felt I was in great danger of being wounded (for example, losing a limb).
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Felt in Danger of Being Wounded
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-G: Felt in Danger of Being Wounded
synonyms: DRRI1-G: Felt in Danger of Being Wounded

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was concerned that my health might suffer due to exposure to nuclear, biological, or chemical (NBC) agents.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Health Might Suffer NBC Agents
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-G: Health Might Suffer NBC Agents
synonyms: DRRI1-G: Health Might Suffer NBC Agents

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I thought I would never survive.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - G: Thought I Would Never Survive
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-G: Thought I Would Never Survive
synonyms: DRRI1-G: Thought I Would Never Survive

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - In preparation for deployment: I was accurately informed about the role my unit was expected to play in the deployment.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - H: Accurately Informed About Role

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - In preparation for deployment: the training I received made me feel confident in my ability to use my equipment.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - H: Confident Ability Use Equipment

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - In preparation for deployment: the training I received made me feel confident in my ability to perform tasks assigned to me during deployment.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - H: Confident to Perform Tasks

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - In preparation for deployment: I had all the supplies and equipment needed to get my job done.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - H: Had All Supplies Needed

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - In preparation for deployment: I had enough gear to protect myself in case of an attack.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - H: Had Enough Gear in Case Attack
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-H: Had Enough Gear in Case Attack
synonyms: DRRI1-H: Had Enough Gear in Case Attack

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - In preparation for deployment: my military duties and assignments were what I expected.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - H: Military Duties What I Expected
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-H: Military Duties What I Expected
synonyms: DRRI1-H: Military Duties What I Expected

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - In preparation for deployment: the training I received prepared me to deal with the region's climate.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - H: Prepared to Deal With Climate
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-H: Prepared to Deal With Climate
synonyms: DRRI1-H: Prepared to Deal With Climate

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - In preparation for deployment: my unit was well-prepared to operate as a team during deployment.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - H: Prepared to Operate as Team
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-H: Prepared to Operate as Team
synonyms: DRRI1-H: Prepared to Operate as Team

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - In preparation for deployment: the training I received taught me everything I needed to know for deployment.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - H: Taught Me Everything I Needed
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-H: Taught Me Everything I Needed
synonyms: DRRI1-H: Taught Me Everything I Needed

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - In preparation for deployment: I received appropriate training for the nature of the deployment I experienced.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - H: Training for Deployment

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I could count on my family members or friends at home for good advice.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - I: Could Count on Family Advice
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-I: Could Count on Family Advice
synonyms: DRRI1-I: Could Count on Family Advice

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: family members and/or friends at home were sincerely interested in hearing what was going on with me.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - I: Family Sincerely Interested

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I had family members or friends at home I could talk to when I had a problem.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - I: Had Family I Could Talk To
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-I: Had Family I Could Talk To
synonyms: DRRI1-I: Had Family I Could Talk To

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: I was happy with the amount of communication I received from people at home.

terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - J: Service Appreciated by Leaders

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment: members of my unit were interested in my well-being.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - J: Unit Interested My Well-being

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment, the people I worked with: used a position of authority to pressure me into unwanted sexual activity.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - K: Authority Pressure Unwanted Sex

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment, the people I worked with: treated me as if I had to work harder than others to prove myself.

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment, the people I worked with: made crude and offensive sexual remarks directed at me, either publicly or privately.

terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-K: Made Crude Sexual Remarks at Me
synonyms: DRRI1-K: Made Crude Sexual Remarks at Me

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment, the people I worked with: tried to make my job more difficult to do.

terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-K: Make My Job More Difficult
synonyms: DRRI1-K: Make My Job More Difficult

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment, the people I worked with: acted as though my mistakes were worse than others'.

terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-K: My Mistakes Worse Than Others
synonyms: DRRI1-K: My Mistakes Worse Than Others

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment, the people I worked with: offered me a specific reward or special treatment to take part in sexual behavior.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - K: Offered Reward Take Part in Sex
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-K: Offered Reward Take Part in Sex
synonyms: DRRI1-K: Offered Reward Take Part in Sex

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment, the people I worked with: physically forced me to have sex.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - K: Physically Forced to Have Sex
terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-K: Physically Forced to Have Sex
synonyms: DRRI1-K: Physically Forced to Have Sex

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment, the people I worked with: "put me down" or treated me in a condescending way.
terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - K: Put Me Down

terms.preferredTerm: DRRI-2 - K: Questioned My Abilities Perform

terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-K: Threatened Me If Not Sex

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment, the people I worked with: touched me in a sexual way against my will.

terms.submissionValue: DRRI1-K: Touched Sexual Way Against Will
synonyms: DRRI1-K: Touched Sexual Way Against Will

terms.definition: Deployment Risk & Resilience Inventory-2 - During deployment, the people I worked with: treated me in an overly critical way.

synonyms: DRRI1-K: Tried to Talk into Sexual Acts
